bibl.title: The Gaza 'Wine' Jar (Gazition) and the 'Lost' Ashkelon Jar (Askalônion).
bibl.note: The ἀσκαλώνιον and the γαζίτιον are storage-jars, amphorae, or containers for a variety of products. Archaeological evidence. Inventory of askalônia and gazitia and their contents, from the papyri and ostraca. Identification of the jars.
bibl.seg: MAYERSON Philip, The Gaza 'Wine' Jar (Gazition) and the 'Lost' Ashkelon Jar (Askalônion).

The ἀσκαλώνιον and the γαζίτιον are storage-jars, amphorae, or containers for a variety of products. Archaeological evidence. Inventory of askalônia and gazitia and their contents, from the papyri and ostraca. Identification of the jars.
